name: Forester
overview: You are the Forester Robin and you must save the forest from dying. The evil witch that lives in your forest has cast a spell on all the leaves of the trees in your forest. Now all the leaves are brown and it is your task to color them green again. Normally this would be simple but the evil witch has also cast a spell on all the woodland animals, sending them after you. So you had better watch out! Good luck! Developed by Ramon van der Laar (coding and graphics), Joachim Wijnhoven (sound and music), and Roland Hermans (sound effects) of Visual Delight and published in the following: • Game On 1992/03 • Game On GE 1993/1
